Title: The Big House Pt. 2
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Justin Noble, Carly Hallam (story editor), Jessica Polonsky (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake is torn between the warden and Romero, while a local mobster claims he can prove that Hawkins is guilty.
